alert.note: Alert for Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Oconto and east central Shawano Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillett, or 16 miles east of Shawano, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oconto Falls, Morgan, Sampson, Green Valley, Krakow and Advance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
